Name: DIG THE GROUND
About the game: Dig the Ground is a unique Match3 puzzler in which you have to match gems of the same color and use all sorts of tools to clear the ground tiles beneath you. Youâ€™ll find that this bright and colorful brain teaser includes multiple levels of complexity that vary greatly from level to level. Your goal is to clear tiles and get the gold chests hidden underground. Assemble crystals of the same color into chains - the more you collect, the bigger the explosion! Test your puzzle skills today! - 25 color levels with unique challenges - Vibrant colors and satisfying game mechanics - 7-8 hours of gameplay
